verbose_text: TcSCA expression in yeast rescues mutants deficient in the Golgi and vacuolar Ca 2+ -ATPase, PMC1, and TcSCA restores growth of PMC1 mutants on Mn 2+ containing media, suggesting a role in Mn 2+ uptake [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: TcSCA expression in yeast rescues mutants deficient in the Golgi and vacuolar Ca 2+ -ATPase, PMC1, and TcSCA restores growth of PMC1 mutants
